2016-1603 (La. 9/16/16)

HERMAN, HERMAN & KATZ LLC, et al. v. Elton JOHNSON, et al. NO. 2016-CC-1603 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 16, 2016

Applying For Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Avoyelles, 12th Judicial District Court Div. B, No. 2013-9879; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. CW 16-00391

|: Denied.

KNOLL, J., recused.
